text: Messianic Judaism is a movement of Jews who believe that Jesus (called by them with his Hebrew name Yeshua) is the Jewish Messiah, and who perform this belief in a Jewish way (observing the regulations of the Torah etc.).About History MesJud MJAA:About:Messianic Judaism They are called Messianic Jews. The main branches of Judaism do not consider Messianic Judaism to be Judaism, but rather a form of Christianity, because Judaism rejects Jesus/Yeshua as the Jewish Messiah.browse.asp?s=messianic&f;=tqak&offset;=4 Orthodox: "Why Don't Jews Believe in Jesus?" ==References== Category:New religious movements Category:Jewish denominations Category:Christian movements and denominational families
title: Messianic Judaism
